description: Creates a user in FinSpace kdb environment with an associated IAM role.

parameters.name: environmentId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment where you want to create a user.

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the user.

parameters.name: iamRole
parameters.description: The IAM role ARN that will be associated with the user.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A list of key-value pairs to label the user. You can add up to 50 tags to a user. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that ensures idempotency. This token expires in 10 minutes. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: userName
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the user.

nested_items.name: userArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that identifies the user. For more information about ARNs and how to use ARNs in policies, see IAM Identifiers in the IAM User Guide.

nested_items.name: environmentId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the kdb environment.

nested_items.name: iamRole
nested_items.description: The IAM role ARN that will be associated with the user.
